Hi all -

Heading to Philly area...anyone out there looking to spend some money on a nice sword? (Yes, paying down fresh sword debts again...never ending!) Always fun to get together with local collectors when in their area. Will be south of Philly (Marcus Hook) for a visit for awhile. You can always find me by cell phone: (314) 800-4848. I'm not so sure I'll bring anything with me -- show-and-tell -- but who knows. Car is stuffed but...

Ron
STL
